Yes, I _think_ it's correct that you've changed this. Or at least, I don't understand why it currently returns `['C3']` on master.

On master, if we do
```python
ax = s.plot(color="C3")
```
then `ax.lines[0].get_color()` is `"C3"`, not `["C3"]`. So this seems consistent with that.
That test was added in PR #29122. I'm very confident the original test was wrong and would fail if rendered with Matlotlib.
